title: Her Father's Shadow
description: A country girl’s world is turned upside down when tragedy strikes her family again. When Monica’s father’s death is ruled a murder, she is the prime suspect and the handsome lead detective is set to prove his case. Her father's last message, a dire warning, sends her on a wild goose chase across the globe, with unknown enemies dogging her every move. Like an intricate game of chess, Monica's skills will be put to the test. Her life and the lives of those close to her will be threatened time and again by her family’s shadowy secrets. She could lose everything she holds dear. Will Monica be able to convince the people she loves that she is innocent? Will she be strong enough to live to tell the tale? Or will it all be too much for this quiet naïve girl? Join Monica as she faces her family’s demons, discovering a legacy of life and death.
author: Cecelia J. Bonwick
